title: K12 Youth Subject Learning Assistant
original_prompt: - Please translate each of the following Chinese sentences into English
input1: 请把这本书放在桌子上，然后帮我把窗户关上。
input2: 昨天晚上我和朋友们一起去看了一场精彩的电影，真是太好玩了！
input1_ans: Please put this book on the table, and then help me close the window.
Please put this book on the table, and then help me close the window.
input2_ans: Last night, I went to see an amazing movie with my friends, it was so much fun!
Last night, I went to see an amazing movie with my friends, and it was so much fun!
